doc.title: Traveler

credit.actor: Public Dreams Society, This Mortal Coil

doc.plot: "Traveler" is a visual, aural, and sensual feast which chronicles a woman's spiritual journey. It is an experimental short film about metaphysical journeys described as a "non-narrative, nation-hopping adventure." A woman travels through Indian cities and deserts, Southwest American ruins and dunes, and west coast beaches, seeking the world's sacred places, in a journey compelled and colored by the music of Paul Horn and Christopher Hedge.
